markdownRemark.html:
Allow me to reintrodcue myself…

Since I’ve revamped this, I figured it would be a good idea to provide a bit more detail on who I am and what my story is (so far). Especially since right now the site is more focused on blogging than being my online portfolio.

Quick background:

Education Background
  • BS in Materials Science and Engineering - Boise State University 12

  • MS in Software Development - Maryville University 18

    Professional Background
  • Charles Schwab, Associate Software Engineer June 2019 -
  • United States Air Force, Operations Engineering Manager December 2016 - May 2019
  • United States Air Force, Lead Project Manager August 2014 - December 2016
  • United States Air Force, Mechanical Engineer August 2013 - July 2014
  • United States Air Force, Junior Engineer July 2012 - July 2013

My Full Story
